name: Empty Choice
description: Facing you are two empty tracks, neither one has any obstructions. There are no humans around for miles around. No one is watching. You've always wanted to pull a big train lever? Havn't you? Now's your chance, go on. Show the world you can. It'll be worth it, trust me..

options.name: Human-Free Track
options.description: Empty track stretches all the way to the horizon and beyond. There hasn't been a recorded bandit related train incident around these parts for decades, centuries even.

options.name: Human-Free Track
options.description: Honestly, both sides are completely empty, give that lever a whirl, live a little.
